title: Combined ceiling fan and light

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a combined ceiling fan and light, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a bottom perspective view of a combined ceiling fan and light.
FIG. 2 is a top perspective view of FIG. 1.
FIG. 3 is a reduced bottom planar view of FIG. 1.
FIG. 4 is a reduced top planar view of FIG. 2.
FIG. 5 is a side view of FIGS. 1 and 2; and,
FIG. 6 is another side view of FIGS. 1 and 2 that is perpendicular to the side view shown in FIG. 5.
